archetypes.name: Perfectionist
archetypes.description: It's safer for me to endlessly improve than finish and possibly fail

archetypes.name: People Pleaser
archetypes.description: It's safer for me to stay agreeable, helpful, and low-maintenance than possibly upset others

archetypes.name: Controller
archetypes.description: It's safer for me to manage everything to ensure the outcome is positive

archetypes.name: Performer
archetypes.description: It's safer for me to do what's needed to be liked than leave it to chance

archetypes.name: Ghost
archetypes.description: It's safer for me to hide or withdraw than show up and possibly be hurt
